org.apparatus_templi

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apparatus_templi.Message

  •  class Message
extends Object
    A complete message. This message can be generated from a single message fragment (if only a single message fragment with a fragment number of 0 was received), or can be generated from multiple fragments by combining their data blocks sequential from fragment 0 to fragment n.
    Author:
    Jonathan Nelson

    • Constructor Detail

      • Message

        public Message(byte options,
       int dataLength,
       String destination,
       byte[] data)
        Build a complete Message from the given data.
        Parameters:
        options - the option byte.
        dataLength - the length of the data block
        destination - the destination driver that this message should be passed to.
        data - the data block of the message.

      • Message

        public Message()
        Build an empty Message

      • getTransmissionType

        public int getTransmissionType()
        Returns an integer representation of the transmission type. Valid types are text(0) and binary(1). If the transmission type is text, then the data block should be interpreted as ASCII (or UTF-8) text. If the transmission type is 11 then the data block is binary data of an indeterminate type.
